Name: ethylene diamine production, from ethanolamine | ethylene diamine | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: Production from ethanolamine and ammonia at elevated temperature. The overall process yield is of 93%. The inventory is based on stoichiometric calculations.;C2H7NO + NH3 --> C2H8N2 + H2O;References:;Eller K., Henkes E., Rossbacher R., Hoke H. (2011): Amines, aliphatic, Ullmanns Encyclopedia of Industrial Chemistry, Wiley-VCH.
